summary: THE DAY AFTER PURCHASE, THE WIPER BLADE WAS OFF TRACK ON THE PASSENGER SIDE, WHICH CAUSED A DEEP SCRATCH TO BECOME EMBEDDED IN THE WINDSHIELD.  THIS DEFECT WAS REPAIRED.  ABOUT A WEEK AGO, THE WIPERS STARTED TO HIT EACH OTHER ABOUT 3/4 OF THE WINDSHIELD, THEY WOULD BIND, GET STUCK AND LIFTED ABOUT 1/4 OF AN INCH.  ONCE LOOSE THEY CONTINUED THEIR OPERATION.  CONSUMER IS CONCERNED ABOUT THE WIPERS BINDING AGAIN AND THE POTENTIAL OF ANOTHER SCRATCHED WINDSHIELD.  *JG *JB
